scripts.build: yarn buildBuilder && yarn workspaces foreach --topological-dev --no-private run g:echo | cat > topologicalDeps.txt && yarn workspace @tinacms/scripts build:all
scripts.build:e2e: yarn build && yarn workspace kitchen-sink-starter build
scripts.g:nuke: cd $INIT_CWD && yarn exec rm -rf dist && echo "cleaned"
scripts.publish: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --no-private --verbose npm publish --tolerate-republish --access public
scripts.publish:dev: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --no-private --verbose npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag dev --access public
scripts.publish:beta: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --no-private --verbose npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag beta --access public
scripts.push-tags: changeset tag && git pull && git push --follow-tags
scripts.swapDeps: yarn workspaces foreach --include @tinacms/starter --include starter-basic run g:swap
